overview:
Relentless visionary technology entrepreneur CXO team leader and philanthropist focused on building billion $ companies that improve the world. Involved in 14 startups, created 1000+ jobs, & netted investors $170MM. We work hard, play hard, & laugh alot.

Productivity / Claims to Fame: -Founder/CEO, 1st Internet [StockPicks.com, 1995] Timing Service that saved investors $ billions [NASDAQ IPO in 1998: raised $130MM as CEO] -COO at Western Digital Silicon Valley subsidiary [landed $40MM sale to Brocade & Adaptec, 2001], which led to -Founder/CEO of 1st company [AlaStor, 2003] to converge IP and FC SAN Networks - saved $ billions on expensive FC staff; vision adopted by Cisco Systems [UCS, 2009], followed by: -Founder/CEO of disruptive Internet Platform Startup [2010].
